BusinessProcessFeedback.name: BusinessProcessFeedback
BusinessProcessFeedback.description: Setup object that stores information about the survey and the question associated with each stage in a customer lifecycle map. Customer lifecycle maps are used to track the scores provided by customers across their lifecycle using Salesforce Surveys.

ActionName.description: Name of the survey used to gather feedback.

ActionParam.description: Name of the question used to gather feedback.

BusinessProcessDefinitionId.description: Unique identifier of the stage associated with the survey and question.
